name: Political Games
tagline: functions to illustrate, and sometimes solve, simple games
body:
# Hell is other people.
Code for creating figures used in *Political Games* by [Macartan Humphreys](http://macartan.nyc), @macartan

```{r}
library(hop)
```
Here is an example of matching pennies
```{r}
gt_bimatrix()
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
